name: @percy/config
description: handles loading and adding options to percy configuration files. uses [cosmiconfig](https://github.com/davidtheclark/cosmiconfig) to load configuration files and [json schema](https://json-schema.org/) with [ajv](https://github.com/epoberezkin/ajv) to val
